text: Mbega umwe muri mwebwe aranezerezwa n’ukuba afise umurima w’ibiti vy’imitende hamwe n’ibiti vy’imizabibu icamwo inzuzi imbere yiwe, nawe muri iyo mirima akaba ayironkeramwo ivyimburwa vy’ubwoko bwose, yashikirwa n’ubusaza nawe afise ibibondo bidakomeye, mumwanya hagaca haduka igihuhusi c’umucanwa kigaca gishikira wamurima ugaca usha ugatokombera, uko rero niko Imana ibi garagaza mu majambo yayo matagatifu kugira ngo mushobore kwiyumvira
